GeoWirx, Inc. is proud to announce our grand opening to our XEN VPS hosting packages!

GeoWirx, Inc. specializes in providing highly reliable hosting solutions to all of our clients.

We are currently running our grand opening VPS sale to the WHT community at a very affordable rate. These specials are a limited time offer only! During sign up customers enter the coupons provided below.

There is a 1 coupon per customer limit (first 20 customers!). Available to new customers only!

We have decided to deploy early and offer all of our customers this special and in the same time get customer input on how we can better improve our services to them. We will spare no expense at working on finding the best solutions that all of our customers will like to see and hear.

We like to call this the final beta stage of our release as we are working on a client side control panel applications (not yet available) so they can monitor their bandwidth usages, cpu usages, and many more gizmos and gadgets for their VPS hosting plans . We have no exact ETA on when our GeoWirx Panel will be available but you can rest assured that we are indeed working on it.

With this grand opening special we are offering an introductory price and giving the same high quality services that many customers are looking towards.

We highly look for customer input in order to better ourselves as a company and in order to provide quality solutions at the fraction of the cost.
